about_the_game:
The gunfire roars, and the explosive flames rise in the wind-blown sky.
Now, the flying battleships have begun gunfire.


-What kind of game?
A game where you control a fleet-scale airship and fight enemy flying battleships.
I think it's more like a simulation or a strategy than an action.


-Early access, how far can you play?
The main part of the game, "New Game", is not yet playable.
Instead, you can play "campaigns". It is based on historical facts.


-What is the world view like?
This original world is based on the post-World War I and pre-World War II worlds. (plans)
Steel ships fly in the sky, and countries have flying warships. (plans)


-What kind of ship will appear?
Flying ships modeled after ships from 1900 to 1950 will appear.
-Mikasa-class battleship
-Hashidate-class cruiser
-Giuseppe Garibaldi-class armored cruiser
-Dingyuan-class battleship
-Borodino-class battleship
-Diana-class cruiser(Aurora)
-Yamato-class battleship (plans)
-Dreadnought-class battleship (plans)
-Monitor-class ironclad (plans)
-etc.

name: Kurogane of the sky

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-26700QM
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A game where you control a fleet-scale airship and fight enemy flying battleships. I think it's more like a simulation or a strategy than an action.
